General.Name: Luoyang Northglass Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Luoyang Northglass Technology Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells glass deep processing equipment in China. The company's deep processing equipment comprise glass tempering furnaces, coating lines, glass automation systems, glass storage systems, glass cutting machines, buffer systems, and vertical seaming and washer machines. It also offers processed glass products, such as laminated, coated, curved, insulating, printed, and toughened glass products; and HVLS and general fans. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries, such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Switzerland, Japan, Russia, India, Brazil, Argentina, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Turkey, etc. Luoyang Northglass Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.
